review: I have an Apple TV but I love all things Amazon and I wanted to watch Prime Instant Video on my television. I flip flopped between the Fire TV Stick and the more expensive Fire TV. I eventually landed on the stick thinking it would be portable enough to move from room to room.It's not *as* portable as I'd hoped. I was expecting simply a stick plugged into the USB (like Chromecast). If I had just read the description prior to ordering, I'd have known that it also needs to be plugged into an outlet. Still, this is not an issue. I can still take it from room to room with only a little annoyance. (Seriously? These are the things I can find to complain about?)I have only had a connectivity issue once and it was easily resolved with a reboot. The interface is super easy to use and finding what I'm looking for can be done quickly. As an odd aside, I'll add that I like the little chubby remote much better than Apple's slick silver "always lost" remote.All in all, I think this is a must have ESPECIALLY for Prime subscribers.
author: Kimberley Littleton

review: I was really waiting for the fire stick so I could mirror from my kindle like I did w/ my Apple TV. What they fail to mention is that is will only mirror with the Kindle HDX and hire. I have a Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and cannot mirror from my device. There should at the VERY LEAST be an app available or a device update that will allow mirroring capabilities. HUGE MISS for Amazon. I'm EXTREMELY disappointed.

author: Matthew H. Walker

review: I just wanted to get a small, affordable "smart TV" box for the TV in my bedroom and didn't want to drop $100 on another Apple TV (the best TV box on the market). This is just okay. It's slow, and I find myself having to unplug it and replug it back in every single time I want to watch it because none of the apps function unless I do so (despite my network connection being "very good"). It also takes about a minute or so for the picture to come into full HD. For the price it's a pretty acceptable device, but if you can afford the Apple TV, I recommend getting that instead.
